classes.name: Adventurer
classes.description: A brave soul who has set out to explore the world. Adventurers are jacks of all trades, capable of learning any path.

classes.name: Fighter
classes.description: A master of martial combat, fighters excel in physical prowess and weapon mastery. They are the frontline warriors of any party.

classes.name: Magic User
classes.description: A student of the arcane arts, magic users wield powerful spells to devastate their enemies. They sacrifice physical prowess for magical might.

classes.name: Thief
classes.description: A cunning rogue who relies on stealth and precision. Thieves excel at striking from the shadows and avoiding detection.

classes.name: Healer
classes.description: A devoted servant of the divine, healers channel holy power to mend wounds and protect their allies. They are essential to any group.

classes.name: Paladin
classes.description: Holy warriors who combine martial prowess with divine magic. Paladins are champions of justice and protectors of the innocent.

classes.name: Berserker
classes.description: Savage warriors who channel their rage into devastating attacks. Berserkers sacrifice defense for overwhelming offensive power.

classes.name: Knight
classes.description: Noble warriors sworn to a code of honor. Knights are heavily armored defenders who protect their allies with unbreakable resolve.

classes.name: Wizard
classes.description: Masters of arcane knowledge, wizards command the most powerful destructive spells. Their mastery of magic is unparalleled.

classes.name: Necromancer
classes.description: Dark mages who command the powers of death. Necromancers raise the dead and drain life from their enemies.

classes.name: Elementalist
classes.description: Mages who have mastered the primal elements. Elementalists wield fire, ice, lightning, and earth with devastating effect.

classes.name: Assassin
classes.description: Deadly killers who strike from the shadows. Assassins deal devastating critical strikes and excel at eliminating single targets.

classes.name: Ranger
classes.description: Skilled hunters and trackers, rangers are masters of wilderness survival. They excel at ranged combat and tracking prey.

classes.name: Shadow
classes.description: Masters of darkness and deception, shadows blend with the night itself. They are untouchable phantoms who strike without warning.

classes.name: Cleric
classes.description: Devoted servants of the gods, clerics channel divine power to heal and protect. They are the most powerful healers in the realm.

classes.name: Druid
classes.description: Guardians of nature who draw power from the natural world. Druids can shapeshift and command the forces of the wild.

classes.name: Shaman
classes.description: Spirit walkers who commune with the ancestors. Shamans wield both healing and destructive elemental magic.
